2.1.8.1.2. systemmetadata.SystemMetadata¶

class systemmetadata.SystemMetadata(xmldoc)¶

Wrapper around a System Metadata entry. Provides convenience properties for accessing the parsed content of the document.

__init__(xmldoc)¶
Parameters:xmldoc – (Unicode) The XML document to parse as System Metadata.

Methods

__init__(xmldoc)
param xmldoc:(Unicode) The XML document to parse as System Metadata.
toXml([encoding, pretty]) Spits out representation of the parsed xml.
